about_the_game:
Welcome, Investigator! 

You work for an organization called, "The Order," a paranormal investigation company that strictly deals with entities & objects called "Anomalies." These anomalies are manifestations of pure chaos, and it's our job to contain & eliminate them. ... we're losing control of the situation. Fast. 
   
In the Order HQ, you'll be able to upgrade your equipment, study on known & unknown entities, shop for allies & other important materials, edit your character's classes & skill trees, & much more. You can also just hang out & socialize with other fellow investigators if you feel like it! 




Rico's Theater is a large facility that will actively change with every investigation that you initiate. No investigation will be the same. You will have multiple tasks & objectives to complete in each investigation of which vary in difficulty & skill. Your primary objective will be to lure any anomalies using the appropriate equipment & to eliminate them once they show themselves.




The longer your investigation lasts, the more dangerous & difficult the anomaly(s) will become. Eliminate any threats you encounter. Remember, you will not always be dealing with one single anomaly. There will most likely be multiple depending on your investigation. 


Good luck, investigator. We're excited to work with you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz ; Shader Model 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 11 (Latest Feature Update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Rico's Theater is an extremely intense first-person online multiplayer horror game. Choose multiple classes that vary in weapons & abilities & work together with friends in fighting dangerous entities.
